array.name: fragment_descriptions
array.item: Welcome in your mobile first training.
In this section you will learn how apps are developed. Native, HTML5 and Hybrid apps won\'t have any secrets for you!! Additionally you will learn how to beta test an app and follow its crashes
In this section you will learn everything about app distribution, Discover ASO (app Store Optimisation) and download attribution.
In this section you will learn how engage people in apps. Be ready to discover a new world of mobile apps metrics and dimensions.
In this section you will learn how you can retain people. We are going to use two techniques Marketing automation and DeepLinking.
